item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，马来西亚国家石油公司（Petronas）与英联邦液化天然气公司（Commonwealth LNG）正在洽谈长期供应事宜
item.description: 据四位贸易和行业知情人士透露，马来西亚国有石油天然气公司（Petroliam Nasional，简称 Petronas）正在与 Commonwealth LNG 谈判，从该公司位于路易斯安那州卡梅伦的设施购买液化天然气。【原文：Malaysian state-owned oil and gas firm Petroliam Nasional, or Petronas, is in talks with Commonwealth LNG to buy liquefied natural gas from the U.S. company's facility in Cameron, Louisiana, according to four trading and industry sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 世界银行认为商品价格将跌至 COVID 前的水平
item.description: 世界银行周二预测，部分由于贸易动荡导致的全球经济增长疲软将推动全球商品价格在2025年下降12%，在2026年再下降5%，达到2020年代的实际最低水平。【原文：The World Bank on Tuesday forecast that weakening global growth due in part to trade turmoil will push global commodity prices down 12% in 2025 and another 5% in 2026 to the lowest levels of the 2020s in real terms.】

item.title: 引擎资本推动 Lyft 探索战略选择，可能出售 Lyft
item.description: 在代理权争夺战中，激进投资公司 Engine Capital 周二推动共享出行平台 Lyft 考虑战略替代方案，包括出售。【原文：Activist investment firm Engine Capital pushed ride-sharing platform Lyft on Tuesday to consider strategic alternatives, including a sale, amid a proxy battle.】

item.title: 白宫称特朗普将于周二签署汽车关税行政令
item.description: 白宫新闻秘书卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）在新闻发布会上表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统将于周二签署一项关于汽车关税的行政命令。【原文：President Donald Trump will sign an executive order on auto tariffs on Tuesday, White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said at a news briefing.】

item.title: 汇丰银行成为最新一家将标普 500 指数年度目标下调至 6000 点以下的券商
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）周二成为最新一家将标准普尔500指数（S&P 500 index）年底目标下调至6000点以下的全球券商，原因是美国经济增长放缓以及与关税相关的企业盈利压力。【原文：HSBC on Tuesday became the latest global brokerage to slash its year-end target for the S&P 500 index below the 6000 mark, weighed down by slower U.S. economic growth and tariff-related pressure on corporate earnings.】

item.title: 阿克塞尔-施普林格与 KKR 敲定媒体集团分拆事宜
item.description: 施普林格周二表示，阿克塞尔-施普林格（Axel Springer）和美国投资公司 KKR 已敲定媒体集团的分拆事宜。【原文：Axel Springer and U.S. investment firm KKR have finalized the division of the media group, Springer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Match 与 Anson Funds 和解，董事会增添新董事
item.description: 在线约会公司 Match Group 将在董事会中增加一名消费技术高管，并为所有董事每年参加选举奠定基础，从而结束与股东 Anson Funds 的纠纷。【原文：Online dating company Match Group will add a consumer-technology executive to its board and lay the groundwork for all directors to stand for election annually, ending a dispute with shareholder Anson Funds.】

item.title: 马士基表示，尽管存在关税和贸易不确定性，但仍维持所有跨太平洋航线
item.description: 马士基周二表示，尽管美国征收进口关税和中美贸易战带来了不确定性，但马士基迄今仍保持了所有预定的跨太平洋航线，只是减少了一些船只。【原文：Maersk said on Tuesday it had maintained all its scheduled trans-Pacific sailings to date, albeit downsising some vessels, despite the uncertainty caused by U.S. import tariffs and the trade war between the United States and China.】

item.title: KKR 和 Capital Group 发起基金，目标是混合私人和公共信贷
item.description: KKR 和 Capital Group 周二推出了两只基金，允许散户投资者投资公共和私人信贷。【原文：KKR and Capital Group launched two funds on Tuesday, which would allow retail investors to invest in both public and private credit.】

item.title: 白宫亚马逊关税价格公告充满敌意
item.description: 白宫新闻秘书卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）周二表示，亚马逊宣布将在产品价签上标明关税价格是一种敌对行为。【原文：White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said on Tuesday that Amazon's announcement that it will include the price of tariffs on the pricetag for products is a hostile act.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯与 Luminar 签订协议，开发最新激光雷达传感器
item.description: Luminar 首席执行官表示，梅赛德斯-奔驰已与 Luminar 技术公司签署了一项新协议，以开发和集成其最新的激光雷达产品，改变了其现有传感器的供应协议。【原文：Mercedes-Benz has signed a new agreement with Luminar Technologies to develop and integrate its latest lidar product, Luminar's CEO said, shifting from a supply deal for its currently available sensors.】

item.title: 高端百货零售商萨克斯推出亚马逊店面
item.description: 萨克斯第五大道百货公司（Saks Fifth Avenue）周二表示，该公司将在亚马逊网站（Amazon.com）上开设一个店面，销售来自杜嘉班纳（Dolce&Gabana）和巴尔曼（Balmain）的高端设计师产品，这是该电子商务巨头在奢侈品销售领域的最新尝试。【原文：Saks Fifth Avenue is launching a storefront on Amazon.com where it will sell high-end, designer products from Dolce&Gabana and Balmain in the e-commerce giant's latest foray into selling luxury goods, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，塔塔新工厂开始生产 iPhone，富士康紧随其后，苹果将目光投向印度
item.description: 消息人士称，印度南部一家生产 iPhone 的新工厂已经投产，另一家工厂将于 5 月份开始出货，苹果公司希望在受关税影响的主要制造中心中国以外的地区提高生产。【原文：A new plant making iPhones in southern India has started production and another will begin shipments in May, as Apple looks to boost manufacturing beyond its tariff-hit main manufacturing hub, China, sources said.】

item.title: 法国首次指控俄罗斯情报机构多次实施网络攻击
item.description: 法国外交部周二直接指责俄罗斯 GRU 军事情报机构发动了一系列网络攻击，包括对政府部门、国防公司和智库的攻击，并称这些攻击旨在破坏法国的稳定。【原文：France on Tuesday directly accused Russia's GRU military intelligence agency of a string of cyber attacks, including on ministries, defence firms and think tanks, which the foreign ministry said aimed to destabilise the country.】

item.title: 受涨价提振，油漆制造商 Sherwin-Williams 第一季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 谢尔温-威廉姆斯公司（Sherwin-Williams）周二公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于其工业涂料价格上涨，该公司股价在收盘前上涨了 4.7%。【原文：Sherwin-Williams on Tuesday beat the Wall Street estimate for first-quarter profit, helped by higher prices for its industrial paints, sending its shares up 4.7% before the bell.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份商品贸易逆差大幅扩大
item.description: 由于进口激增，3 月份美国货物贸易逆差急剧扩大，这表明贸易对第一季度的经济增长造成了巨大拖累。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit in goods widened sharply in March as imports surged, suggesting that trade exerted a large drag on economic growth in the first quarter.】

item.title: 法拉利在推出电动车之前推出全新 296 Speciale 混合动力车型
item.description: 本周二，法拉利推出新款 296 Speciale 及其敞篷版，刷新了其混合动力车系列，这家豪华跑车制造商正准备首次跃入全电动时代。【原文：Ferrari refreshed its hybrid range on Tuesday with the new 296 Speciale and its convertible version as the luxury sports car maker prepares for its first leap into the fully electric era.】

item.title: 由于 Eylea 需求下降，Regeneron 制药公司第一季度业绩不佳
item.description: 周二，Regeneron 公司的第一季度业绩未能达到华尔街的预期，这主要是受其大片眼疾药物 Eylea 需求减弱的影响，导致该公司股价在盘前交易中暴跌 7%。【原文：Regeneron missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter results on Tuesday, hurt by waning demand for its blockbuster eye disease drug Eylea, sending the company's shares tumbling 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 如果贸易战持续，出口就业将大幅下滑--美国商业团体
item.description: 美中贸易全国委员会（US-China Business Council）周二表示，去年美国对华出口总值达1407亿美元，现在将面临中国至少125%的报复性关税，这将危及支撑这些出口的数十万美国就业岗位。【原文：All American exports to China worth $140.7 billion last year now face a retaliatory Chinese tariff of at least 125%, putting at risk hundreds of thousands of American jobs that support the exports, the US-China Business Council said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 通用汽车因发动机问题召回近 60 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 通用汽车周二宣布，由于发动机问题，将在美国召回近 60 万辆 SUV 和卡车。【原文：GM is recalling nearly 600,000 SUVs and trucks in the United States due to engine issues, it announced on Tuesday.】

item.title: 标准普尔全球公司将把移动业务部门从母公司分离出来，以精简业务
item.description: 评级机构S&P Global周二表示，公司计划将向汽车制造商和汽车供应商出售数据的移动业务部门分离出来，成立一家独立的上市公司，以精简业务。【原文：Ratings provider S&P Global said on Tuesday it plans to separate its mobility division, which sells data to vehicle manufacturers and automotive suppliers, into a separate public company in an attempt to streamline operations.】

item.title: 美国塔台季度收入超出预期，电信基础设施租赁需求强劲
item.description: 受租赁业务稳定需求的推动，无线基础设施提供商美国塔塔公司（American Tower）周二公布的第一季度营收超出预期。【原文：Wireless infrastructure provider American Tower on Tuesday beat the first-quarter revenue estimate, driven by steady demand for its leasing business.】

item.title: 康宁第二季度核心销售额高于预期，原因是人工智能热潮促进了需求增长
item.description: 康宁公司周二预计，第二季度核心销售额将高于华尔街预期，这主要得益于其用于人工智能相关基础设施的光连接产品需求强劲。【原文：Corning forecast second-quarter core sales above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, aided by strong demand for its optical connectivity products used in AI-related infrastructure.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，印度准备将 "面向未来 "的贸易协定作为美国谈判的甜头
item.description: 印度政府官员表示，新德里准备在与华盛顿的贸易谈判中加入甜言蜜语，通过确保其他贸易伙伴无法获得优越条件来 "面向未来 "达成协议，以此推动与特朗普政府迅速达成协议。【原文：New Delhi is prepared to include a sweetener in trade talks with Washington that would "future-proof" a deal by ensuring no other trade partners could have superior terms, as it pushes for a quick agreement with the Trump administration, Indian government officials said.】

item.title: 雅高高管称中东旅游业繁荣可抵御关税风险
item.description: 酒店集团雅高的中东、非洲和亚太地区首席执行官表示，雅高的本地化供应链应能缓冲美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税影响，并补充说他预计该地区的旅游需求将保持强劲。【原文：Hotel group Accor's localised supply chains should cushion the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, its CEO for the Middle East, Africa and Asia-Pacific said, adding he expected travel demand to stay robust in his region.】

item.title: 卡夫亨氏因需求低迷下调年度销售额和利润预期
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周二下调了全年有机食品销售额和利润预期，原因是价格上涨和不确定的经济背景对其零食和即食餐包的需求造成了冲击。【原文：Kraft Heinz on Tuesday slashed its full-year organic sales and profit forecasts, as demand for its snacks and ready-to-eat meal kits take a hit from higher prices and an uncertain economic backdrop.】

item.title: 美国贸易不确定性下，PayPal 盈利超预期，维持全年盈利预测
item.description: 本周二，即使在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税加剧经济不确定性之际，PayPal 的第一季度盈利仍超过了华尔街的预期，并坚持其全年盈利预测。【原文：PayPal beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter earnings and stuck to its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, even at a time when U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs have fueled economic uncertainty.】

item.title: iPhone 销量下滑，苹果投资者寻求关税和人工智能战略的明确性
item.description: 苹果公司周四发布业绩报告时，预计将面临一连串的质疑，包括推迟推出关键的人工智能功能，以及中美关税对峙对其业务的影响。【原文：Apple is expected to face a string of questions over the delayed roll-out of key AI features and the impact of the Sino-U.S. tariff standoff on its business, when it reports results on Thursday.】

item.title: 可口可乐季度收入降幅低于预期
item.description: 周二，可口可乐公司公布第一季度收入降幅小于预期，主要得益于其苏打水、果汁和牛奶产品 Fairlife 的提价和强劲需求。【原文：Coca-Cola reported a smaller-than-expected drop in first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, benefiting from price hikes and strong demand for its sodas, juices and milk offering Fairlife.】

item.title: 特朗普关税给企业带来利润警告和不确定性
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战继续令企业界不寒而栗，通用汽车和沃尔沃汽车放弃了指导，阿迪达斯警告将提价，保时捷和伊莱克斯周二下调了全年展望。【原文：General Motors and Volvo Cars abandoned their guidance, Adidas warned of price hikes and Porsche and Electrolux cut their full-year outlooks on Tuesday as U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war continued to send shivers through the corporate world.】
